title: a lonely peanut trying to make friends :3
body:
Hey everyone,

Since it's pre season I've wanted to try find some friends to chill out and play some normal games with.
Everyone's welcome :D

Also if anyone has a group of friends that wouldn't mind another player I'd be happy to join.

Feel free to add me : Smol Peanut

replies.body: Feel free to add me, I have discord. I'm a supp main (unranked) :)
